main_definition: Ethernet is a widely used computer network technology that allows computers to communicate with each other through cables.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A networking standard for connecting computers in a local area network (LAN)
meanings_and_examples.example: My home office has an Ethernet connection to the internet.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An alternative term for twisted pair cabling used in LANs
meanings_and_examples.example: The new office building was installed with Category 6 Ethernet cables.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A connection method between devices that allows them to share resources and data
meanings_and_examples.example: I shared an Ethernet cable to connect my computer and printer in the same room.
